text: Is tareeqe se zyada tawaqqu ki ja sakti hai ke log theek theek shahadat denge, ya kam az kam is baat hi ka khauff karenge ke unki kasamon ke baad dusri kasamon se kahin unki tardeed na ho jaye. Allah se daro aur suno, Allah nafarmani karne walon ko apni rehnumayi se mehroom kar deta nahin hai
